thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 14 of 218
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
I was informed in detail of what is expected of me and all my up coming events including any cost's that will transpire over time. Reed answered all my questions and explained step by step any other questions I may have had. I was extremly impressed with how kind Reed was on the phone and how he did all the leg work and made the calls for installation around my area that fit my schedule.
Thank you for making this bump in the road feel a little smaller.
